summary: This bill, the "Mining Waste, Fraud, and Abuse Prevention Act of 2025," modernizes regulations for hardrock mining on federal lands. It closes lands to new mining claims, institutes prospecting licenses and hardrock leases, and mandates stricter environmental standards. Key provisions include royalty requirements, a displaced material reclamation fee, and enhanced enforcement mechanisms. The Act addresses claim maintenance fees, protection of special areas, consultation procedures with Tribes, and requirements for environmental considerations.
